name: King George III: Golden Jubilee of His Reign
obverse: Uniformed bust of George III facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: GEO . III . BORN . 4TH. JUNE 1738. ASCENDD. THE THRONE OCTR. 25TH. 1760.
COMPLETED 50TH. YEAR OF HIS REIGN OCTR. 25TH. 1810.
reverse: Three young children sit atop a plinth hold a flaming heart before Britannia. The rays of the sun shine above.
description: George III celebrated the 50th year of his reign in 1809 and the celebration continued into 1810.
